caption.p: Agonistic behaviors, definitions, and sample sizes (where recorded) documented for Abdopus aculeatus throughout all observations. Mating attempts here refer to those that elicited aggressive interactions. MMA = number of times observed during male-male aggression; MFA = number of times observed during male-female aggression; NQ = not quantified in this study. Quantified behaviors are listed in approximate order of increasing risk of injury or indication of stress.
